message.raw:
Fixed bug where any device based on PulseBlaster_No_DDS did not get labels on the front panel buttons in BLACS.
This was because the change to the pseudoclock/clockline object hierarchy in labscript requires an extra method to be defined in the tab class as outputs are now more removed from the device the tab belongs to.

fixes #9
